allow: Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-call apple_messages '{"operation": "unread"}')
Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-call apple_messages operation=unread)
Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-call apple_messages operation=read limit=2)
Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-call apple_messages operation=read limit=1)
Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-call apple_messages operation=send phone_number="+821012345678" message="Test message from MCP tools" 2 >& 1)

Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-call apple_messages operation=schedule phone_number="+821012345678" message="Scheduled test message" scheduled_time="2025-05-30T10:00:00")
Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-call apple_notes operation=folders)
Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-call apple_notes operation=list limit=2)
Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-call apple_notes operation=create title="MCP Test Note" body="This is a test note created by MCP tools")
Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-call apple_notes operation=search search_text="MCP Test")
Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-call apple_contacts operation=search limit=2)
Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-call apple_contacts operation=create first_name="MCP" last_name="Test" email="mcp@test.com" phone="+821012345678")
Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-list 2 > /dev/null)
Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-call apple_messages operation=schedule phone_number="01067674112" message="사랑해" scheduled_time="2025-05-29T17:00:00")

Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-call apple_messages operation=schedule phone_number="01067674112" message="사랑해 (KST 테스트)" scheduled_time="2025-05-29T17:00:00+09:00")

Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-call apple_messages operation=schedule phone_number="01067674112" message="사랑해 (시간대 수정 테스트)" scheduled_time="2025-05-29T17:00:00+09:00")
Bash(PYHUB_MCPTOOLS_EXPERIMENTAL=1 uv run python -m pyhub.mcptools tools-call apple_messages operation=schedule phone_number="01067674112" message="사랑해" scheduled_time="2025-05-30T18:00:00+09:00")
